events.message: The claimant reported a car accident that occurred at an intersection with minor injuries and vehicle damage.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under 'Auto Accident' due to the nature of the incident involving a vehicle collision.
An insurance claims agent was assigned to the case to handle communication and investigate the details of the auto accident.
The claimant was officially acknowledged by our team, confirming that we have received all initial reports about the car accident.
Requested the claimant to submit the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates for further evaluation.
The claimant submitted all requested documents, including the police report and multiple repair shop assessments for the vehicle collision.
Our investigation team began reviewing the submitted documents and contacted witnesses to establish the sequence of events in the accident.
The investigation concluded confirming liability and the extent of damages, allowing the claim to move forward for settlement.
A settlement amount has been proposed based on repair costs and coverage limits detailed in the claimantâ€™s auto policy.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the prompt processing and clarity of communication regarding the settlement proposal.
The insurance claim was officially approved, confirming that the coverage and settlement terms were accepted by both parties.
Payment was processed and issued to the claimant for vehicle repairs as outlined in the approved settlement.
The claim was closed after verifying payment receipt and confirming the claimant has no further questions or concerns.
The entire case file was archived in our system for future reference and compliance purposes following claim closure.
